markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Dwarf](/Traits.aspx?ID=54)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 631 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A creature with this trait is a member of the dwarf ancestry. Dwarves are stout folk who often live underground and typically have [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12). An ability with this trait can be used or selected only by dwarves. An item with this trait is created and used by dwarves.
name: Dwarf
